"Hilda": "It's time. Air support, prepare to engage the enemy."
"I-I have an urgent report! Scanners are showing two large hostile readings inside the Themis!"
"Oh no! One of our aircraft has been hit! It's going down! This is terrible!"
"Calm down, Melitta. All ARKS members in the vicinity of F-5: assist the damaged aircraft."
"Remaining aircraft, regroup and continue the search-and-destroy operation. Don't let the other hostile get away."
